description: DNSLookupView is a DNS tracing tool for Windows 11/10 that allows you to view the details of every DNS query sent through the DNS Client service of Windows. For every DNS query, the following information is displayed: Host Name, Query Type (A, AAAA, and so on), Query Status (Error or succeeded), Query Result, Query Timestamp, ID and name of the process that requested the DNS lookup.
shortcuts: NirSoft\DNSLookupView - DNS Lookup Viewer for Windows 11_10
